definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: In the hexagonal close packed structure, slip systems are more limited .
sentences.chinese: 在六方密排晶格中，滑移系受到较多的限制。

sentences.english: From the stereographic plots of the slip line directions measured around the specimen surface, the slip planes were determined.
sentences.chinese: 根据试样表面滑移线的方向，在极图上确定滑移面。

sentences.english: From the stereographic plots of the slip line directions measured around the specimen surface, the slip planes were determined.
sentences.chinese: 根据试样表面滑移线的方向，在极图上确定滑移面。

sentences.english: The mechanisms of the three stages are slide or climbing of dislocation.
sentences.chinese: 不同发展阶段的机制均为位错滑移成攀移的结果。

sentences.english: Clarity and thermoformability are enhanced by the incorporation of nucleating and slip agent.
sentences.chinese: 净度和热成型性能，从而加强了对核和滑移代理组建。

sentences.english: Face plate is protected by a rubber outer ring that prevents leaking, slippage and cracking.
sentences.chinese: 脸板保护橡胶外圈，防止泄漏，滑移和开裂。

sentences.english: The free vibrational properties of Duffing-type sliding systems are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了杜芬型滑移系统的自由振动特征。

sentences.english: Deep excavation also leads to a large pile-soil relative displacement when the skin friction is totally mobilized.
sentences.chinese: 桩侧摩阻力完全发挥时需要的桩土滑移量增大。

sentences.english: Asymmetrical slip of the facets results in a rotational component to the spondylolisthesis.
sentences.chinese: 小关节突关节不对称的滑移会导致椎体滑移出现旋转。

sentences.english: Asymmetrical slip of the facets results in a rotational component to the spondylolisthesis.
sentences.chinese: 小关节突关节不对称的滑移会导致椎体滑移出现旋转。

sentences.english: The deep-seated weak layer S1 under the slope may lead deep sliding.
sentences.chinese: 深层部分布有S1软弱层，存在着深层滑移问题。

sentences.english: The application of the characteristics is explained in an example of constructing a slip line field.
sentences.chinese: 以一个滑移线场构造为例，说明了某些性质的应用。

sentences.english: The Woxl-fault in western Hunan is a brittle shear zone characterized by shearing—sliding along its strike.
sentences.chinese: 湘西沃溪断裂为一具走向剪切滑移性质的脆性剪切带。

sentences.english: In engineering, the excessive slip of shear connectors will arouse the failure of the beams.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，剪切联接件的超量滑移会引起梁的破坏。

sentences.english: The phenomena of separation, reclosing and sliding occur between pile foundation and soil.
sentences.chinese: 桩基与土体间发生了脱开再闭合和滑移现象。

sentences.english: In the default model the friction coefficient is defined as afunction of the equivalent slip rate and contact pressure.
sentences.chinese: 静动摩擦系数间的转换定义为给出的中间滑移率的值。

definition: to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
to fail/to come to nothing/to fall through (of plans, hopes)/to lie
to move relative to one another
